body.name: GE JES1657BMTS Microwave Oven, Black Stainless Steel, 13.625 in
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 8 mins
features: Sensor cooking controls; Automatically adjusts time and power for delicious cooking results.
Weight and time defrost: Simply enter the weight of the food, and the oven automatically sets the optimal defrosting time and power level or set your desired time for defrosting.
Turntable: Rotates food throughout the cycle.
Instant On controls: One-touch instant operation.
body.description: Heat leftovers and speed up cooking in your kitchen with this GE countertop microwave. Instant-on settings let you cook popcorn, vegetables and other foods with the touch of a single button, while weight and time defrost options make it easy to prepare meats for cooking. Featuring a large turntable, this GE countertop microwave delivers even, reliable heating for your dining and snacking needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was well packaged and I was pleased when I set it up permanent on the kitchen counter and works great it is as pictured in the store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just received this microwave yesterday. When I received it, there were no signs of damage which was my major concern. I just tried it out to heat some water and it worked fine. I look forward to using it quite a bit in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets our food hot quick!
reviews.reviewText: This microwave is huge and has a lot of different buttons, which I was not used to. It has a sensor in it that can detect when your food is done cooking, it is like magic to me. I have been testing out all the different settings and I love the reheat button for leftovers from the fridge. It gets my food just the right temperature. The dinner plate button does really well for heating out food that has gone a little cold. I am also impressed with the beverage button as I like to heat up milk for hot chocolate and it does it right most of the time, I've only had one spill but it was soooo easy to clean up! This microwave is so easy to clean and to keep clean, it still looks just like the day I got it out of the box. It's much quieter than other microwaves I've used. The beeps to tell you it's done however are pretty loud. It will keep beeping to remind you to get your food out. It's a little annoying but I do need the reminder to get up and get my food, and I'm sure you can turn that off if you wanted to. Overall, I am so pleased with this microwave and I have no real complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We Got to Install Microwave Ovens...
reviews.reviewText: ...custom kitchen deliveries.These are money for something, however, and will not leave you in dire straits.You get a really cool looking microwave (if that matters to you) that quite frankly is smarter than I am and also does a lot more. One of these days I may actually read the manual and figure out how to do something beside timed cooking and setting the clock, but as for now that's about as far as I've gotten, and it does that exceptionably well. Having bought some cheap microwaves in my day, I would advise against them, as most struggle to last a year under moderate use. You can usually tell quality by the weight, as the junk ones have none. This unit is a nice stout one with some genuine heft, giving one the confidence that it should last quite some time, but only time will tell. To me, it certainly seems a high quality unit, and I am more than happy with it so far.For what it is, what it does, and what it costs: Five StarsI am the Totally Unbiased Reviewer Dude (T.U.R.D.) and that is how I see it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great smaller microwave
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the office. Our old microwave was on the fritz and we were due for a new one. This one fits right in place of the old one. Super easy to use, just like my GE microwave I have at home. I think it might be a smidge louder than my other one, but nothing too crazy.One thingw as strange, the box was in fine condition when it arrived, but there were two large dents in the corners of the microwave. Not sure how they got there with the box still intact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great counter microwave for apartments.
reviews.reviewText: GE JES1657BMTS Microwave Oven, Black Stainless Steel, 13.625 inReal good microwave for apartments. My son uses this in his apartment that did not come with one. It does take a little bit of counter space. but it is worth it.It has all of the necessary options such as quick 1-6 minutes heating and add 30 seconds to heating. It also has a few presets for popular items like popcorn and pizza.It heats up and make food for the bachelor without any complaints.Easy to clean up as well with the removable spinning plate.So far after a couple of months, it has worked well.I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freestanding/countertop black stainless steel microwave that works great!
reviews.reviewText: What drew me to this was the black stainless steel design. All of my appliances I purchased a few years ago are in black stainless steel, but my microwave was a regular stainless steel color and it stood out a bit. It wasn't so much of an issue I was in a hurry to replace it, but knew that I'd be on the lookout for something that would bland in more in my kitchen.When the door to the microwave started sticking, then wouldn't stay closed any more, I started shopping to see what was out there. I was thrilled when about a week later I found this one by GE in a black stainless steel. The only other ones in this color I'd found so far were built-in ones, and I was looking for something free standing, so this was perfect.The size is great. Nice and large, but not massive. I'm able to heat up anything in it and it does a great job with defrosting foods as well. It works very fell and looks great. I'm very pleased with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: needed a microwave for our downstairs area when we were too lazy to go upstairs to the kitchen and it works perfectly. looks nice and sleek too, love it!
